real_estate.name: Project Balogun 2.0

location.address: 10, Abudu Street, Abule Oja, Akoka, Yaba, Lagos

market.High demand for student accommodation: Yaba is home to over 40% of the tertiary institutions in Lagos, including the University of Lagos, Yaba College of Technology, and the Federal College of Education, Akoka. This means that there is a high demand for student accommodation in the area, which can be a good investment opportunity for landlords.

market.High demand for rental properties: In addition to the high demand for student accommodation, Yaba is also a popular destination for young professionals and families. This is due to its proximity to major business hubs and educational institutions. As a result, there is also a high demand for rental properties in the area.

market.Limited supply of new properties: The supply of new properties in Yaba is limited, which is another factor that contributes to the high demand for real estate in the area. This makes it a good time to invest in property in Yaba, as the value of properties is likely to continue to increase in the future.

real_estate.track_record:
1. A beach vacation rental in Holden Beach, NC, that we purchased for $275,000 and generated a cash-on-cash return of 25% in the first year. 
 
2. A beach vacation rental in Holden Beach, NC, that we purchased for $275,000 and generated a cash-on-cash return of 25% in the first year.
